title: Evictions
creator_credit: Richard Lowenstein, Lyn Nicolson, Wendy Lowenstein, Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Australian Film Commission
brief_description: Documentary/drama on police-enforced evictions in Melbourne during the 1930’s depression and the tactics the organised unemployed used at the time to combat the situation. Based on the memories of Noel Counihan and Tom Hills and adapted from the book ‘Weevils in the flour’ by Wendy Lowenstein, the film combines interviews with period reconstruction. Erwin Rado Award for Best Australian Short Fiction, Melbourne Film Festival, 1980.
